mapper.insert: INSERT into fnq(fq_no, me_no, fq_question, fq_answer , fq_CH) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(fq_no), 0)+1 as fq_no FROM fnq), #{me_no}, #{fq_question}, #{fq_answer}, #{fq_CH})
mapper.select:
SELECT fq_no, fq_question, fq_answer, fq_date, fq_CH, r FROM( SELECT fq_no, fq_question, fq_answer, fq_date, fq_CH, rownum as r FROM( SELECT fq_no, fq_question, fq_answer, fq_date, fq_CH FROM fnq
where fq_question LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
where fq_answer LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
where fq_question LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR fq_answer LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
ORDER BY fq_no DESC ) WHERE fq_CH = 'H' ) WHERE r >=#{startNum} AND r <= #{endNum}

SELECT fq_no, fq_question, fq_answer, fq_date, fq_CH, r FROM( SELECT fq_no, fq_question, fq_answer, fq_date, fq_CH, rownum as r FROM( SELECT fq_no, fq_question, fq_answer, fq_date, fq_CH FROM fnq
where fq_question LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
where fq_answer LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
where fq_question LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR fq_answer LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
ORDER BY fq_no DESC ) where fq_CH = 'C' ) WHERE r >=#{startNum} AND r <= #{endNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM (select fq_ch, fq_question, fq_answer from fnq where fq_ch = 'C' )
WHERE fq_question LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
WHERE fq_answer LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
WHERE fq_question LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR fq_answer LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
